response.headline: Our Little Sister by Hirokazu Kore-eda film recommendation with festival accolades and positive review
response.summary: "Our Little Sister" by Hirokazu Kore-eda is described as "irresistible, an intimate, warm embrace of a film that radiates joy and harmony, deeply charming and quietly moving." The film received recognition at Cannes, San Sebastian, Toronto, and AFI film festivals.

extracted_text: IRRESISTIBLE...AN INTIMATE, WARM EMBRACE OF A FILM THAT RADIATES JOY AND HARMONY. DEEPLY CHARMING AND QUIETLY MOVING.
Part 6 | Hirokazu Koreeda's "Our Little Sister" is such an incredible little film
objects: four young women in traditional clothing
image_details.key_interest: Film recommendation for "Our Little Sister" by acclaimed director Hirokazu Kore-eda
visual_hierarchy: Festival laurels (Cannes, San Sebastian, Toronto, AFI)
